not-found--page-description: Sorry, we can not find a page at this address.
privacy--content:
Teacher Account Information

When you create a teacher account, you must provide a valid email address and password. These details are not public and can be modified at any time. Beekee Live will not share this information with third parties.

Publications, photos, users

Beekee Live follows a strict data protection policy. The data published on Beekee Live are hosted on servers located in Switzerland. The Beekee Live platform is therefore subject to Swiss data protection law. Publications, photographs, user names and any other data published on the platform are the exclusive property of the user. At any time, a user may choose to permanently delete his/her data. In no event will Beekee Live transmit this data to third parties.

Intervention of a technician

On request of the user, a technician can access a space and consult the data stored on it in order to solve a technical problem.

Cookies

Like many websites, Beekee Live uses cookies to facilitate the use of the platform. The information contained in these cookies is not used by Beekee Live for any other purpose.
register--terms:
By registering, you accept our terms and conditions.
Your e-mail address will not be disclosed to third parties.
register--mail-exist: There already exists a user account with this email address.
register--mail-no-valid-message: Please enter a valid email address.
register--mail-content:
Welcome to Beekee Live!

We’re glad you’re here. Start teaching today by creating your first Beekee Live space!

Tip : Did you know that you can use Beekee Live on computer, smartphone or tablet without the need of installing an app?

The Beekee Team
space-edit-categories--page-description:
The categories are used to classify posts.
Unlike tags, categories are defined in advance by the teacher.
space-edit--description-change-code: Share this code with your students so they can join this space.
space-edit--description-flow: By enabling Continuous Flow, new publications are displayed in real time.
space-edit--description-free-users: By activating "Free authors", users are able to enter their username when they first log in. Otherwise, they will choose from an editable list under "Manage authors".
space-edit--select-permissions-own: Authors can edit their own publications
space-edit--select-permissions-none: Nobody can add or edit publications
space-edit--description-sync: Connect the beekee box using an ethernet cable to sync its content with the cloud (www.beekee.ch). This may take several minutes.
space-edit--change-code-confirm-message: The access code has been changed.
space-edit--change-code-already-used-mes: This code is already assigned to another space.
space-edit--delete-space-message: Permanently delete this space and its contents ?
space-edit--sync-login-message:
To synchronize this space with the cloud, you must have an account on www.beekee.ch.
If this is the case, enter the username linked to your account :
space-edit--sync-error-message: A problem has occurred. Check that the box is connected to the internet and try again.
space-edit--update-message:
Updating of the box may make the platform inaccessible for several minutes.
Do you want to continue ?
space-edit--update-waiting-message: The box will be updated, please wait...
space-edit--permissions-public-space: Allows anyone to access the contents and interact within this Space without needing an Access Code
space-edit-authors---page-description:
Author names are used to identify publications.
For example, add the name of your students or the name of a group.
space-edit-authors--add-author-error-mes: There is already an author with this name.
index-student--title: The platform to promote real-time collaboration
index-student--wrapper-text:
A private space to share photos and messages
with your students, colleagues or friends.

This space does not exist.

index-student--create-your-space-3: to promote real-time collaboration with your students?

lessons-post-submit--help:
Lessons must be exported in HTML5 format within Storyline.
The resulting folder must be zipped before being uploaded, and the .zip file must have the same name as the zipped folder it contains.
